channel.title: Programs on SIPEG — Shafqat Institute for Pakistan & Emerging Geopolitics
channel.description: Recent content in Programs on SIPEG — Shafqat Institute for Pakistan & Emerging Geopolitics

item.title: China Corner
item.description: China’s rise and changing dynamics of cooperative to competitive relations with the U.S are re-shaing the world order. We analyze China’s policy signals, investment flows, defense and security policies, particularly the Belt and Road Initiative(BRI).China- Pakistan Economic Corridor (CPEC) and broadly its linakges with the U.S Indo-Pacific strategy and Pakistan’s strategic interests and future direction.

item.title: Geopolitics & Regional Security
item.description: Mapping power shifts, conflict/cooperation patterns, and Pakistan’s security calculus across its neighborhood and great-power competition.

item.title: Trade, Investment & Economic Policy
item.description: Fiscal stability, trade architecture, and investment that drive inclusive, innovation-led growth.

item.title: Education, Curriculum & National Capacity
item.description: Building human capital through curriculum reform, skills, and leadership development.

item.title: Culture, Identity & Diplomacy
item.description: Identity, media, and cultural production as strategic assets in Pakistan’s diplomacy and social cohesion.

item.title: Technology & Strategic Foresight
item.description: Technology rivalry, AI, and strategic foresight shaping Pakistan’s economic and security choices.

item.title: Advisory, Training & Collaboration
item.description: Advising, consultancy, trainings, collaborations, and research that link insight to action.
